content: List down 25 words that end with 'tion'.

Certainly! Here are 25 words that end with "tion":

1. Information
2. Education
3. Communication
4. Celebration
5. Application
6. Imagination
7. Operation
8. Collaboration
9. Motivation
10. Conversation
11. Organization
12. Exploration
13. Investigation
14. Transformation
15. Reservation
16. Preparation
17. Celebration
18. Contribution
19. Creation
20. Solution
21. Situation
22. Relation
23. Condition
24. Action
25. Function

I hope this list helps you! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
